column4: hello i got a very weird thing going on with my grub involving a grub error 15 anyone think they can help me fix it?
we'll all give it a try
are you getting this error after a fresh install?
umm no this is an old install of 8.04
what did you do before this started?
worked for months and now getting this strange error
i dont think i did anything to cause this.
i've not been messing with my grub or anything. rebooted a few times today to OC my comp a little and it worked fine until the last OC atempt when it suddenly wouldnt boot off sda1 anymore
is OC--> overclock?
yeah
does it boot fine when you bring it down to standard freq?
no i tried brining it back down that didnt fix the issue.
do you have the livecd with you? if yes, boot off it and do a grub-install on your boot partition
i was thinking that actually. i just finished downloading a new livecd since i lost mine also it was an old version of ubuntu anyway
i'll try that tommorow though. a grub change out is kind of involved and it's 2 am here. to late/early to be doing something that involved
while i have your atention thugh any online manuals or guides for a grub instal/?
sure there are a lot of them, let me link you to one of them
thanks
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=224351
that is a very good manual.
i think i discovered what the grub error 15 means. ummm grub cant find any stage 1 file
ok
8.04 is LTS
it wouldnt all be on the same server
